languages.text: Это существо благословлено духом машины. {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Отдача{/g} его оружия уменьшена в два раза, а {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} всех целей против атаках существа снижены на <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ИНТ{/g})</u>%.
languages.original_text: This creature is blessed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is halved, and all their targets suffer −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

languages.text: This creature is blessed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is halved, and all their targets suffer −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.
languages.original_text: Это существо благословлено духом машины. {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Отдача{/g} его оружия уменьшена в два раза, а {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} всех целей против атаках существа снижены на <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ИНТ{/g})</u>%.

traits.locale_text: This creature is blessed by the Machine Spirit. The recoil of their weapons is halved, and all their targets suffer −<u>(2 × INT bonus)</u>% to dodge and parry against this creature's attacks.

This creature is blessed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is halved, and all their targets suffer −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

languages.text: Esta criatura está bendita por el espíritu máquina. El {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} de su arma se reduce a la mitad y todos sus objetivos sufren −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}desvío{/g} contra los ataques de esta criatura.
languages.original_text: This creature is blessed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is halved, and all their targets suffer −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura está bendita por el espíritu máquina. El {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} de su arma se reduce a la mitad y todos sus objetivos sufren −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % a {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}desvío{/g} contra los ataques de esta criatura.

languages.text: 此生物受到了机魂保佑。此生物的武器{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}减半。所有敌人遭到此生物攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}降低<u>（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%。
languages.original_text: This creature is blessed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is halved, and all their targets suffer −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

traits.locale_text: 此生物受到了机魂保佑。此生物的武器{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}减半。所有敌人遭到此生物攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}降低<u>（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%。

languages.text: この生物は機械精霊の加護を受ける。彼らの武器の{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}は半減し、彼らの全てのターゲットはこの生物の攻撃に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ドッジ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}パリィ{/g}が−<u>(2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%になる。
languages.original_text: This creature is blessed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is halved, and all their targets suffer −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

traits.locale_text: この生物は機械精霊の加護を受ける。彼らの武器の{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}は半減し、彼らの全てのターゲットはこの生物の攻撃に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ドッジ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}パリィ{/g}が−<u>(2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%になる。

languages.text: Diese Kreatur ist vom Maschinengeist gesegnet. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} ihrer Waffen halbiert sich, und all ihre Ziele erleiden −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} gegen ihre Angriffe.
languages.original_text: This creature is blessed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is halved, and all their targets suffer −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur ist vom Maschinengeist gesegnet. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} ihrer Waffen halbiert sich, und all ihre Ziele erleiden −<u>(2× {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} gegen ihre Angriffe.

languages.text: Cette créature est bénie par l'Esprit de la Machine. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} de ses armes est réduit de moitié, et toutes ses cibles subissent -<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} contre les attaques de cette créature.
languages.original_text: This creature is blessed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is halved, and all their targets suffer −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature est bénie par l'Esprit de la Machine. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} de ses armes est réduit de moitié, et toutes ses cibles subissent -<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} contre les attaques de cette créature.
